title: Channel Cross Functional Leader, Marcom Europe
summary: The role is part of the Marketing Communications (Marcom) group at Apple, responsible for ensuring compelling marketing communications in Europe.
description: As our channel landscape becomes more vital in Apple’s growth story than ever, it’s crucial we galvanise our channel team to drive for excellence...
key_qualifications: Experience managing a talented team of people and the ability to lead, manage, and motivate. Excellent leadership skills to drive a culture of teamwork and collaboration, and more.
